short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple add-on that lets you pick and choose what sites to apply a slick, dark mode to.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension applies an optional inversion and brightness filter on websites to specific pieces of content on the site.
Once toggled on, it applies to every website you load. If the site you are on has a native dark mode or is dark by default, use the "Ignore this domain" button to let the site use it's own theming.
